reviews.review:
Making this game free was the worst decision ever, regarding hackers. You're almost certain that atleast 1 out of every 2nd game hacks. Freshly bought accounts. But then Valves introduces a new anti cheat, which doesnt do anything, except making you get into more lobbies with cheaters, is my experience. ("You're just bad"; All my recent reports have banned people). I don't consider myself the best player, but after playing this for a long time, prob. 4k hours. It seems that Valve can't handle their own game. 
The game is very amusing at points, even when you lose, if there just werent so many fkn hackers. It's almost unplayable.

Игра старая, графику нужно улучшить. Саму игру нужно сделать более динамичной. Поправить траектории гранат, флэш и т.ж. Также думаю, что физика выстрелов плохо работает. Мне кажется нужно сделать каждому оружие прицел, на подобии как у AUG и т.д.

gra z 2012 laguje mi na minimalnych ustawieniach, nice

I have been playing this game since cs 1.6 and i have to say that the number of toxic ppl is way to high, way to many hackers and it is not getting any better.  it feels like it is not even working to report these players it feels like there is this tolorance towards the hackers cause today its at least 1 out of 10 who cheats in this game or at least it feels like it. 1 in every game these days.
I have played before f2p.
Toxic game, would reccomend to my worst enemy

Три с половиной года неспешной поступательной игры привели к замечательному обновлению от компании Valve, которое снизило FPS до 30 и повысило VAR до 20.
